/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly red brick, punctuated by large windows that reflect the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and trucks moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape.
